transcripts.text: Shalom Chavarim from the Galilee.  Shalom means peace.  Chavarim means friends.  So when I say Shalom Chavarim, I'm saying Shalom dear friends.  Now, if you're only speaking to one person, you would say Shalom Chaber.  But Shalom Chaber is to a guy.  To a girl, you would say Shalom Chavara.  Try it with your friends back home.
